dmca.title: Google DMCA - Vast Explorer, Inc
dmca.body:
Vast Explorer, Inc
16 Macmillan Wharf, Box 493
Provincetown, MA 02657
508-487-8899

Google, Inc
Attn: Google Legal Support DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043

September 4, 2006

To Whom It May Concern,

The page http://subsearesearch.com/pc/barry.html

[which can be found through the use of such search terms as "Pirates", "Treasure", "Haiti", "Morgan", "Barry Clifford" "shipwrecks" and others]

is composed of images that are proprietary to our company, Vast Explorer Inc.

These images were stolen, and were improperly provided to the owner of this webpage.

They are, moreover being used to support untruthful, libelous and unwarranted accusations on this page, and other pages of this website, that are designed to cause harm to our company and various individuals who work for our company.

I have a good faith belief that use of the materials described above is not authorized by the owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed
Sincerely,
[signed]
Kenneth J. Kinkor kinkor@comcast.net

cc Allan Tufankjian, Attorney-at-Law cc Barry Clifford
